channel.title: CVE Feed for gitpython-developers -- GitPython
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gitpython-developers -- GitPython

item.title: CVE-2024-22190|2024-01-11T01:23:17.944Z -- gitpython-developers -- GitPython
item.description: GitPython is a python library used to interact with Git repositories. There is an incomplete fix for CVE-2023-40590. On Windows, GitPython uses an untrusted search path if it uses a shell to run `git`, as well as when it runs `bash.exe` to interpret hooks. If either of those features are used on Windows, a malicious `git.exe` or `bash.exe` may be run from an untrusted repository. This issue has been patched in version 3.1.41.
